Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2017 01:24AM Reginamcdade70 wrote: Hi about two weeks ago I found a rash on my right breast it look like I was bite by a spider there was in a patch form three days l awoke with a dark purple patch under the rash and I also found a lump in that same area so I checked my nipple and there is a clear discharge coming from it i am very concerned my primary doctor asked me was it bleeding from my nipple I told him no he told me to leave it alone now I did alot of research I don't for the life of me can understand why he gave me that information I'm more scared than ever I made a appointment with a surgeon on December 14th of this month because I need to know more than ever so I'm not leaving something that can be a disease and I leave it alone and not live to fight it I have to kids that need me my family have so much cancer in it of all kinds we buried so many family members it need to stop here so please somebody help me to know something or somebody out there just like me or I have nothing to worry bout I need to know something I know I still need to go to the doctor I always expect the worse and pray for the best I've had 17 other surgeries I am a big girl I can handle anything please someone give me some kind of insight
Posts.Title: Looking for guidance and help Monkeymomma Monkeymomma
